title: Oral language development: views of five teachers
creator_credit: David Espar, Louise Henry, Channel 54, KTEH-TV (Television station : San Jose, Calif.) and Veriation Films
brief_description: Suggests methods for improving or maintaining the quality of reading programs. Depicts teachers working with children in an environment which provides maximum opportunity for oral language exposure and interaction. Suitable for tertiary/teacher level.
